Title: Gucci Oud Edp 75ml

Title: Lacoste Touch of Pink Edt 90ml

Excerpt: A fragrance for independent and spontaneous women with the magnetism of vitality. Fashioned in vibrant pink and white, the Lacoste Touch of Pink bottle embodies the scent's effortless charm.

Title: Calvin Klein Euphoria Edp 100ml
Content:
Calvin Klein Euphoria is a Amber Floral fragrance for women.

Highlights
  • Top notes are Pomegranate and Succulent Persimmon
  • Middle notes are Sensual Champaca Flower and Rich Black Orchid
  • Base notes are Liquid Amber, Black Violet, Cream and Mahogany Wood
  • This Euphoria Calvin Klein perfume has the perfect start with the fantastic notes of persimmon, raspberry, passionfruit, peach, green notes, and pomegranate. The beautiful amalgamation of these fruity, tangy, woody nuanced notes produces a unique exotic flavor and aroma that will help you create an unforgettable look and feel.
  • The notes of orchid present in the heart of this Euphoria perfume gives off a light yet invigorating scent that makes you feel appreciated wherever you go. The warm, floral, tea-like notes of champaca and lotus will keep you cheered up.
  • The base notes of this Euphoria Calvin Klein perfume include vanilla, patchouli, mahogany, musk, amber, and violet. These notes play together to create a warm and sensual aroma that will keep the mind and senses of those around you, engaged.
Excerpt: Exotic floral-fruity fragrance Euphoria was launched in 2005. The fragrance is luminous and luscious like fruits notes of which are captured in it. Euphoria is mysterious and appealing like dark exotic flowers. It invites you to enjoy in joys of life.

Title: Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue Edt 100ml
Content:

  • Top notes are Calabrian bergamot, Water Notes, Grapefruit and Fig Leaf
  • Middle notes are Ambroxan, Black Pepper, Patchouli, Violet Leaf and Papyrus
  • Base notes are Incense, Musk, Tonka Bean and Saffron.
Excerpt: Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue was launched in 2016. A strong, masculine fragrance, Dylan Blue encapsulates the sensual scents of the Mediterranean. The fragrance bold ambrox notes, refreshed with hints of bergamot and grapefruit. The earthy and citrusy olfactory notes are enveloped with black pepper, papyrus wood and incense, along with mineral musk, tonka beans and saffron. The bold perfume is stored in a blue, geometric bottle enriched with gold tone accents, evoking the Mediterranean Sea and sand.

Title: Sapil Solid Deodorant Body Spray for Unisex Men 200 ML
Content:
Sapil Solid Perfumed Deodorant Spices, intensified with the mysterious sensuality of Musk. It is a dark, woody experience that pulsates with pure masculine sophistication. Highlights
  • Top Note: Fresh, Citrus

  • Base Note: Musky, Woody
Excerpt:
•Most essential to leave a long-lasting impression or freshness • Exclusively crafted with the extracts that will wrap you in a rich and intoxicating aroma all day • Not only appeals to the senses but also keeps body odour in check for all your daily rigorous tasks
The Solid for Men in its deodorant interpretation is as captivating and confident as its perfume counterpart. Spray it in your washed underarms before you head out for the day to stay protected from body odour. You’ll find yourself getting comfortable with intimacy as the alluring, long-lasting perfume of Solid deodorant envelops you.
